Desc.entry: The Tae Kwon-Do Association of Great Britain is the largest martial arts organisation in Europe. Teaches tae kwon-do to people of all abilities and ages from aged 4 years. Lessons are fun and interesting but also well structured to encourage development and improvement of both body and mind. As well as gaining self defence skills, tae kwon-do helps children gain self confidence and self control. The methods of training promotes key principles such as courtesy and respect.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 6.30-7.30pm (juniors aged 4-14 years), 7.30-8.30pm (seniors aged 15 years and over), Fri 5.30-6.30pm (juniors aged 4-14 years), 6.30-7.30pm (seniors aged 15 years and over)

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
